class.name: AnimationNodeAdd2
class.brief_description: Blends two animations additively inside of an [AnimationNodeBlendTree].
class.description: A resource to add to an [AnimationNodeBlendTree]. Blends two animations additively based on an amount value in the [code][0.0, 1.0][/code] range.

members.member: If [code]true[/code], transform tracks will have their location and rotation applied directly. Normal behavior, when [code]false[/code], adds transforms using blending (linear interpolation).
If [code]true[/code], sets the [code]optimization[/code] to [code]false[/code] when calling [method AnimationNode.blend_input], forcing the blended animations to update every frame.
